extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    • 方法详细资料

      • startAcceptingThread

        protected void startAcceptingThread()
        This thread will spawn a thread to listen to a socket if a new connection is accepted.

      • run

        public void run()
        This thread spawn three new thread 1.Accept new connection 2.Deliver packet 3.Send packet
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

      • handleSendConnection

        protected final java.net.Socket handleSendConnection(int dst)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        This function handle connection (client side). If this is the first message, the new established Socket need to be added to global maps. Otherwise, it just pull out the record from the map.
        参数:
        dst -
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • unicast_receive

        protected void unicast_receive(int dst,
                               byte[] msg)
                        throws java.io.IOException

        dst -
        msg -
        抛出:
